marklogic.body: I had to fight to get on it since I wasn't seeing an OB just a PCM. I lost #2 with a progesterone level of .08 and a beta of 180 so my system had that part right but was just not in support of the pregnancy. My proj with #3 was borderline and never got high even on supps but it made me feel better and helped my system (IMO) stay on target (to quote Luke Skywalker). I ended up Bleeding heavily throughout the entire 36 week pregnancy but he's 4 1/2 so I guess it worked. I know there's some debate as to the oral vs vag prometrium/progesterone support. Glad to hear about the hb that does alleviate some fears.
